review: Works great with Amazon prime,so far so good.
author: Joe

review: It's not bad. The only think is that I get a blank screen when I turn it on. So I have to unplug and then re-plug it. That is a issue for me. Also I haven't been home long enough to use it regularly. Let see what happens when I am.
author: Yolanda Dobles

review: We have a Roku upstairs and the Firestick downstairs.  WIFI is downstairs.  During the movies the Firestick keeps going toLoading screen.  The Roku never does.  So...for the price it is ok.
author: LISA STICKNEY

review: Enjoying the simplicity, ease of use and size.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is my first device like this but so far I like It. I already had a kindle that I was watching prime exclusive shows on so this was a perfect addition.
author: margaret holler

review: I live in South Korea as a US Soldier and this product won't work in Korea.
author: charlie bryant
